amendment.description: To establish prohibitions relating to the purchase or sale of State or municipal securities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1614, under the order of 2/29/2024, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 37 - 53. Record Vote Number: 63.

action.text: Amendment SA 1614 proposed by Senator Paul. (consideration: CR S1068-1069) To establish prohibitions relating to the purchase or sale of State or municipal securities.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1614 proposed by Senator Paul.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1614, under the order of 2/29/2024, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 37 - 53. Record Vote Number: 63.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1614, under the order of 2/29/2024, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 37 - 53. Record Vote Number: 63.
